name: Carousel slider
description:
A prototype with a lot of graphic motion design can be a very slick way to impress investors in a presentation! You can use my infinite carousel slider (loop sliding) interactive component composed of 6 slides which can be dragged infinitely. 



Creating responsive reusable components is a key for successful and speedy prototypes. I created this component for our Figma freak' community. I hope you will also find it useful.


Sharing knowledge is important to me!
